name: Upload videos from cloud storage to YouTube automatically
description: Simplify content management by automatically transferring and uploading videos from Dropbox to your YouTube channel. Enjoy fast, secure, and convenient video uploads, ensuring your content is always up-to-date and readily available to your audience. This Make template uses this [Airtable Base.](https://airtable.com/appSjmIBPEpvoxZJ7/shrWdRhJ7GFfJkyDj)
